description: A modern 3-bedroom house in the heart of Dhaka, with spacious living areas and a beautiful garden.
Cozy summer retreat near the coast of Chittagong, perfect for relaxing weekends.
Beautiful lakeside villa in Sylhet offering serene views and modern amenities.
A comfortable city apartment in Khulna with easy access to shopping and transport.
Luxurious villa surrounded by greenery in Rajshahi, ideal for family stays.
Charming hilltop cottage near Cox's Bazar with panoramic views of the sea.
Residency with stunning sunset views in Barisal, featuring modern facilities.
A majestic palace in Mymensingh with royal interiors and top-notch amenities.
